questions.promptMd: Which element MOST increases reuse value of a story in the library?

answers.contentMd: Tags for role/industry/metric + quotes + before/after + proof links

answers.feedbackMd: Not sufficient for reuse or trust.

questions.promptMd: True or False: Stories should be kept to ~60–90 seconds spoken for exec settings.

answers.feedbackMd: Correct. Short, pointed vignettes land better.

questions.promptMd: Which governance practice keeps the library credible?

answers.contentMd: Periodic verification of metrics and permissions; retire stale items
Prefer anonymous stories to avoid approvals

questions.promptMd: True or False: Tagging stories by risk addressed (e.g., security, downtime) is unnecessary if they’re already tagged by industry.

answers.feedbackMd: Multiple facets improve match quality for specific objections.
Correct. Risk/metric tags matter beyond industry.
